text: Barbara Jean Comstock (n√©e Burns; born June 30, 1959) is an American lawyer and politician. She was the U.S. representative for Virginia's 10th congressional district from 2015 to 2019. She was a member of the Republican Party. Comstock was a member of the Virginia House of Delegates from 2010 to 2014. In 2019, she joined the lobbying firm Baker Donelson as a senior advisor. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Virginia Category:People from Springfield, Massachusetts Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Virginia Category:Lawyers from Massachusetts
title: Barbara Comstock
